Package ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.snakegame.presenter

Class SnakePresenter

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.snakegame.presenter.SnakePresenter
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConsoleSnakePresenter, JavaFxSnakePresenter
public abstract class SnakePresenter extends Object
A presenter that connects a model and a view.

start() method starts a new thread with the game's main loop.
